text:
Had a private event for kids held here during the school holidays.

The staff there were very welcoming. The coach was patient teaching the ways of archery. He even planned out 3 different archery activities to allow the kids hone their archery skills further.

Facility was sheltered & there was water cooler to rehydrate as well.

Thank you for the well-planned activity & kudos to the staff & coach for facilitating the event for us. üëçüèº

Called for booking & they were able to arrange even tho staff were busy elsewhere.

Staff here are so kind and welcoming , coach is very knowledgeable to share tips & techniques to aim better. Highly recommend this place to anyone wanting to learn archery.

Yeah, definitely a family friendly environment for gathering n catch up with my children to play archery match. Staff are friendly and caring, environment are cosy. Definitely will return during school holidays.

This is great place to practise archery, caters to beginners to advanced and the rates are very reasonable the owners are very nice people! You can join the club and join competitions if you are in for the long-haul!

I had a fantastic time today with my family members! The instructors were welcoming and super knowledgeable and helpful when it came to conducting the lessons, and i learnt so much from them. Definitely will come again when I'm free!
